mapper.select:
SELECT
c.nombre AS cliente_nombre, c.documento AS cliente_documento, c.telefono AS cliente_telefono, c.direccion AS cliente_direccion, c.email AS cliente_email, c.vetado AS cliente_vetado,
i.id AS item_id, i.nombre AS item_nombre, i.descripcion AS item_descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento AS item_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia AS item_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta AS item_formatorenta, i.genero AS item_genero,
ir.id AS itemren_id, ir.fechainiciorenta AS itemren_fechainiciorenta, ir.fechafinrenta AS itemren_fechafinrenta,
ti.id AS tipoitem_id, ti.descripcion AS tipoitem_descripcion
FROM VI_CLIENTES AS c LEFT JOIN VI_ITEMRENTADO AS ir ON c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento LEFT JOIN VI_ITEMS AS i ON ir.ITEMS_id=i.id LEFT JOIN VI_TIPOITEM AS ti ON i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id;

i.id AS item_id, i.nombre AS item_nombre, i.descripcion AS item_descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento AS item_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia AS item_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta AS item_formatorenta, i.genero AS item_genero,
ir.id AS itemren_id, ir.fechainiciorenta AS itemren_fechainiciorenta, ir.fechafinrenta AS itemren_fechafinrenta,

FROM VI_CLIENTES AS c LEFT JOIN VI_ITEMRENTADO AS ir ON c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento LEFT JOIN VI_ITEMS AS i ON ir.ITEMS_id=i.id LEFT JOIN VI_TIPOITEM AS ti ON i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id
WHERE c.documento = #{idCliente};
